Upcoming improvements A host of new functions will be added in the near future to broaden the platform’s capabilities. Look Book – Sharing visual concepts for projects among stakeholders via images, videos and artworks will be made easy with Logline’s Look Book function,  Pitching – Showcase your ideas and early drafts for a project or send them directly to clients with this tool.  Meet the Logline Team Logline is the brainchild of two entrepreneurs from Europe. Development began in July 2015 and was supported by Spaze Ventures with the goal of changing the way people work in the video industry. In December 2016 Logline has joined the Mediapreneur incubation program run by Singapore's biggest media company Mediacorp.  Borys Specjalski –Co-Founder of the company is an experienced project manager who previously worked in Afghanistan with the 1TV television station.   Danijela Habek – Danijela is a live TV show producer that has successfully produced three seasons of Got Talent, X Factor and many other internationally-recognized formats.
